message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we believe its value far exceeds $1200000. We are offering it to you for an exclusive price of $1500000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an item of exceptional quality and significance. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1500000. I am willing to pay up to $1200000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
